tool_description: Identifies duplicate and near-duplicate citations in bibliography entries, providing recommendations for consolidation and cleanup.

bibliography_entries.description: Array of bibliography entries to check for duplicates

ignore_case.description: Whether to ignore case differences in comparison

check_doi_duplicates.description: Whether to identify entries with same DOI as duplicates

error_messages: Empty bibliography: Provide at least two bibliography entries for duplicate detection.
Invalid similarity threshold: Value must be between 0 and 1.
Processing failed: Unable to analyze entries for duplicates due to format issues.
usage: Submit bibliography entries to identify exact and near-duplicate citations. Adjust similarity threshold to control detection sensitivity.

total_duplicates.description: Total number of duplicate citations found

duplicate_groups.description: Groups of citations identified as duplicates

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each duplicate group
